thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: Mandana

author: Mandana
title: Mandana
text:
I paid for flowers, champagne and teddy bear package for my new born nephew, paid this scam company "FLORAQUEEN' over 100 Euros February 2017,
thinking my family would receive the gifts BUT FIRST PACKAGE was cancelled on the day (they didn't bother letting me know so i can arrange for gifts elsewhere!) SECOND PACKAGE was delivered with items missing from it!
I have emailed them for 2 weeks now and still they didn't respond, they didn't refund me the money... and here i was thinking "ORDER NOW AND MAKE THEM SMILE" (their MOTO!!) well they didn't make anyone smile, they are smilling ripping people off.
